detailedDescription: Aggregate type used by [[window]]'s constructor to specify its behaviour.

dataMembers.name: name
dataMembers.detailedDescription:
The name of the window.
If the window has a border, then this may for example be displayed on the border.

dataMembers.name: pixel_size
dataMembers.briefDescription: The initial size of the window, in pixels.
dataMembers.detailedDescription:
The initial width and height of the window, in pixels.
This size does not include any border around the window.
